trends: There have been 38 other sightings in Riverside
There were no other sightings in Riverside on or around September 17th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details1. In our front yard, my 17 year old was sitting on our porch and called us all out to see lights in the sky. 2. 9:35 PM 3. Did not know. 4. Bright orange pulsating orbs came in twos "shooting up" from the Western Horizon traveling East, and then arced over in a Southern line making a turn then disappearing ("blinked out"). One last one came by itself and it was twice the size and of a brighter red intensity than all of the others. 5. Amazed (and a little frightened)at what we were seeing, as none of us had ever seen anything like this before. 6. They just blinked out.
Summary: Strange Lights in the sky, Riverside, CA, 9/17/13
